name: Secondary: Fire I
description: Sets a non-Fire weapon's sub element to Fire and adds +10 to its value.

name: Secondary: Fire II
description: Sets a non-Fire weapon's sub element to Fire and adds +20 to its value, as well as +5 to the primary element.

name: Secondary: Fire III
description: Sets a non-Fire weapon's sub element to Fire and adds +30 to its value, as well as +10 to the primary element.

name: Secondary: Water I
description: Sets a non-Water weapon's sub element to Water and adds +10 to its value.

description: Sets a non-Water weapon's sub element to Water and adds +30 to its value, as well as +10 to the primary element.

name: Wyrmstake Boost
description: Raises the Wyrmstake Cannon's damage level by 1.

name: Shelling: Normal I
description: Sets shelling type to Normal and shelling level to Level 3.

name: Shelling: Normal II
description: Sets shelling type to Normal and shelling level to Level 4.

name: Shelling: Normal III
description: Sets shelling type to Normal and shelling level to Level 5.

name: Shelling: Long II
description: Sets shelling type to Long and shelling level to Level 4.

name: Shelling: Wide II
description: Sets shelling type to Wide and shelling level to Level 4.

name: Shelling: Wide III
description: Sets shelling type to Wide and shelling level to Level 5.

name: Attack Melody I
description: Enables attack-focused performances.

name: Attack Melody II
description: Enables attack-focused performances.

name: Defensive Melody I
description: Enables defense-focused performances.

name: Defensive Melody II
description: Enables defense-focused performances.

name: Healing Melody I
description: Enables healing-focused performances.

name: Healing Melody II
description: Enables healing-focused performances.

name: Resilient Melody I
description: Enables performances that nullify status ailments.

name: Resilient Melody II
description: Enables performances that nullify status ailments.

name: Boost Equipped Coating
description: Coating element +10

name: Phial: Power
description: Changes equipped phial to a Power Phial, but reduces Attack by 10.

name: Phial: Element
description: Changes equipped phial to an element phial.

name: Phial: Poison I
description: Changes equipped phial to a Poison Phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Poison II
description: Changes equipped phial to a Poison Phial, and adds +25 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Poison III
description: Changes equipped phial to a Poison Phial, and adds +30 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Paralysis I
description: Changes equipped phial to a Paralysis Phial, and adds +15 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Paralysis II
description: Changes equipped phial to a Paralysis Phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Paralysis III
description: Changes equipped phial to a Paralysis Phial, and adds +25 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Dragon I
description: Changes equipped phial to a Dragon phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Dragon II
description: Changes equipped phial to a Dragon phial, and adds +25 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Dragon III
description: Changes equipped phial to a Dragon phial, and adds +30 to the phial's element.

name: Phial: Exhaust I
description: Changes equipped phial to an Exhaust Phial, and adds +20 to the phial's element attack.

name: Phial: Exhaust II
description: Changes equipped phial to an Exhaust Phial, and adds +30 to the phial's element attack.

name: Phial: Exhaust III
description: Changes equipped phial to an Exhaust Phial, and adds +40 to the phial's element attack.

name: Kinsect Level Boost
description: Raises Kinsect Level by 1.

name: Kinsect Level Boost I
description: Raises Kinsect Level to Level 4.

name: Kinsect Level Boost II
description: Raises Kinsect Level to Level 5.

name: Kinsect Level Boost III
description: Raises Kinsect Level to Level 6, but reduces Attack by 10.

name: Kinsect Level Boost IV
description: Raises Kinsect Level to Level 7, but reduces Attack by 20.

name: Recoil Down Boost
description: Decrease recoil by 1.

name: Recoil Down Surge
description: Decreases recoil by 2 but increases deviation by 1.

name: Reload Speed Boost
description: Increases reload speed by 1.

name: Reload Speed Surge
description: Increases reload speed by 2 but also increases recoil by 1.

name: Steadiness Boost
description: Decreases deviation by 1.

name: Steadiness Surge
description: Decreases deviation by 2 but also decreases reload speed by 1.

name: Normal Effect I
description: Enables loading of Level 2 Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Normal Effect II
description: Enables loading of all levels of ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Pierce Effect I
description: Enables loading of Pierce Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Pierce Effect II
description: Enables loading of all Pierce Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Spread Effect I
description: Enables loading of Spread Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Spread Effect II
description: Enables loading of all Spread Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Shrapnel Effect I
description: Enables loading of Shrapnel Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Shrapnel Effect II
description: Enables loading of all Shrapnel Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Sticky Effect I
description: Enables loading of Sticky Ammo 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Sticky Effect II
description: Enables loading of all Sticky Ammo, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Cluster Effect I
description: Enables loading of Cluster Bombs 1 & 2, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Cluster Effect II
description: Enables loading of all Cluster Bombs, and increases ammo capacity.

name: Add: Normal Ammo I
description: Expands weapon ammo capacity for normal ammo.

name: Add: Normal Ammo II
description: Expands weapon ammo capacity for normal ammo.

description: Enables loading of Piercing Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Pierce Effect II
description: Enables loading of Piercing Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

description: Enables loading of Sticky Ammo and Cluster Bombs, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Fire Effect II

description: Enables loading of Paralysis Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Paralysis Effect II

name: Sleep Effect II
description: Enables loading of Sleep Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Poison Effect I
description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Poison Effect II
description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Exhaust Effect I
description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Exhaust Effect II
description: Enables loading of Poison, Recovery, Demon, and Armor Ammo, and changes ammo capacity.

name: Special: Wyvernheart
description: Changes special ammo to Wyvernheart.

name: Special: Wyvernsnipe
description: Changes special ammo  to Wyvernsnipe.

name: Rapid Fire (Normal)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Normal Ammo 1 & 2.

name: Rapid Fire (Piercing)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Pierce Ammo 1 & 2.

name: Rapid Fire (Spread)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Spread Ammo 1 & 2.

name: Rapid Fire (Shrapnel)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Shrapnel Ammo 1 & 2.

name: Rapid Fire (Sticky)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Sticky Ammo 1.

name: Rapid Fire (Fire)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Flaming Ammo and Piercing Fire Ammo.

name: Rapid Fire (Water)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Water Ammo and Piercing Water Ammo.

name: Rapid Fire (Thunder)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Thunder Ammo and Piercing Thunder Ammo.

name: Rapid Fire (Ice)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Freeze Ammo and Piercing Ice Ammo.

name: Rapid Fire (Dragon)
description: Allows rapid fire of loadable Dragon Ammo and Piercing Dragon Ammo.

name: Poison Coating Boost
description: Strengthens Poison Coating if coatings can be applied to weapon.

name: Paralysis Coating Boost
description: Strengthens Paralysis Coating if coatings can be applied to weapon.

name: Sleep Coating Boost
description: Strengthens Sleep Coating if coatings can be applied to weapon.

name: Close-range Coating Boost
description: Strengthens Close-range Coating, but reduces Attack by 5.

name: Use Power Coating
description: Allows you to apply Power Coatings.

name: Use Poison Coating I
description: Allows you to apply Poison Coatings.

name: Use Poison Coating II
description: Allows you to apply Poison Coatings and enhances them, but reduces Attack by 5.

name: Use Para Coating I
description: Allows you to apply Paralysis Coatings.

name: Use Para Coating II
description: Allows you to apply Paralysis Coatings and enhances them, but reduces Attack by 10.

name: Use Sleep Coating I
description: Allows you to apply Sleep Coatings.

name: Use Sleep Coating II
description: Allows you to apply Sleep Coatings and enhances them, but reduces Attack by 10.

name: Use Blast Coating
description: Allows you to apply Blast Coatings.

name: Use Exhaust Coating
description: Allows you to apply Exhaust Coatings, and grants +10 Attack.

name: Firing: Rapid
description: Modifies weapon for Rapid-based Charged Attacks.

name: Firing: Pierce
description: Modifies weapon for Pierce-based Charged Attacks.

name: Firing: Spread
description: Modifies weapon for Spread-based Charged Attacks.

name: Firing: Charge
description: Modifies arrow Charge Level for Charged Attacks.

name: Firing: Swift
description: Modifies weapon for somewhat unconventional Charged Attacks.

name: Arc Shot: Recovery
description: Changes shot type to Recovery.

name: Arc Shot: Affinity
description: Changes shot type to Affinity.

name: Arc Shot: Anti-shock
description: Changes shot type to Brace.

name: Dulling Strike
description: Has a chance to increase attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

name: Brutal Strike
description: Has a chance to increase damage with a negative affinity attack.

name: Element Exploit
description: Increases damage when exploiting a foe's elemental weakness.

name: Silkbind Boost
description: Increases damage dealt using Silkbind attacks.

name: Defense Grinder I
description: Sharpness is unaffected when guarding.

name: Defense Grinder II
description: Sharpness is slightly restored when guarding.

name: Hellion Mode
description: Attacking in Demon Mode turns every attack into a critical hit, but also doubles sharpness degredation.

name: Maximum Volume
description: Increases a performance's range of effect once it is activated.

name: Phial Switch Boost
description: Grants special effects to phials when executing morph attacks.

name: Lasting Arc Shot
description: Prolongs the bow's arc shot effect.

name: Master Rider
description: Increases damage inflicted by Wyvern Riding, and increases the Wyvern Riding Timer.

name: Wyvern Exploit
description: Increases damage to Bird, Flying, Brute, Piscine, and Fanged Wyverns, as well as Leviathans.

name: Small Monster Exploit
description: Increases damage to small monsters.

name: Anti-Aerial Species
description: Increases damage to flying monsters.

name: Anti-Aquatic Species
description: Increases damage to aquatic monsters.

name: Fireblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with fireblight.

name: Waterblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with waterblight.

name: Thunderblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with thunderblight.

name: Iceblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with iceblight.

name: Magnamalo Soul
description: Increases attack when afflicted by hellfire status.

name: Valstrax Soul
description: Increases Dragon element attack by 20% when afflicted with dragonblight.

name: Chameleos Soul
description: Landing a hit will yield a small chance of boosting Health, Stamina, Attack, or Defense.

name: Kushala Daora Soul
description: Affinity gradually increases when continuously landing hits on foes.

name: Teostra Soul
description: Increases damage dealt by blast explosions.

name: Ibushi Soul
description: Enhances weapon functionality with each piece of Narwa armor you equip.

name: Narwa Soul
description: Enhances weapon functionality with each piece of Ibushi armor you equip.

name: Buddy Rally
description: Increases Palico and Palamute attack power and defense.

name: Spiribird Doubled
description: Occasionally increases the effect of Spiribirds.

name: Brutal Strike
description: Has a chance to increase damage with a negative affinity attack.

name: Element Exploit
description: Slightly increases damage when exploiting a foe's elemental weakness.

name: Defense Grinder I
description: Sharpness is unaffected when guarding.

name: Defense Grinder II
description: Sharpness is slightly restored when guarding.

name: Hellion Mode
description: Attacking in Demon Mode increases affinity but also doubles sharpness degradation.

name: Maximum Volume
description: Increases a performance's range of effect once it is activated.

name: Phial Switch Boost
description: Grants special effects to phials when executing morph attacks.

name: Lasting Arc Shot
description: Prolongs the bow's arc shot effect.

name: Wyvern Exploit
description: Increases damage to Bird, Flying, Brute, Piscine, and Fanged Wyverns, as well as Leviathans.

name: Anti-Aerial Species
description: Increases damage to flying monsters.

name: Anti-Aquatic Species
description: Increases damage to aquatic monsters.

name: Small Monster Exploit
description: Increases damage to small monsters.

name: Fireblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with fireblight.

name: Waterblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with waterblight.

name: Thunderblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with thunderblight.

name: Iceblight Exploit
description: Increases damage to monsters afflicted with iceblight.

name: Magnamalo Soul
description: Increases attack when afflicted by Hellfireblight.

name: Valstrax Soul
description: Increases dragon element attack by 20% when afflicted with dragonblight.

name: Chameleos Soul
description: Each hit has a small chance to boost health, stamina, attack, or defense. Triggers more easily subsequent times.

name: Kushala Daora Soul
description: Gradually increases affinity by continuously landing hits on foes in a short space of time.

name: Teostra Soul
description: Slightly increases damage dealt by blast explosions.

name: Ibushi Soul
description: Greatly increases weapon's defense bonus with each piece of Narwa armor equipped.

name: Narwa Soul
description: Slightly increases weapon's affinity with each piece of Ibushi armor equipped.

name: Buddy Rally
description: Increases Palico and Palamute attack power and defense.

name: Spiribird Doubled
description: Occasionally increases the effect of Spiribirds.

name: Wyrmstake Boost
description: Raises the Wyrmstake Cannon's damage level by 1 and extends the duration of Eruption Cannon boosts.

name: Fanged Exploit
description: Increases damage to Fanged Beasts.

name: Bloody Heart
description: During Bloodblight, attack will increase in accordance with vitality recovered by attacking. Effect ends when Bloodblight ends.
